configuration.name: APPROVED_DOMAINS
configuration.label: Approved Domains
configuration.description: The list of approved domains that can register for your application.  Separate the domains with a comma.

configuration.name: ERROR
configuration.label: Error
configuration.description: The error code/message you wish to write to the tenant logs.
configuration.default_value: Error Code: 003.  Unapproved domain signup attempted

configuration.name: USER_ERROR_MESSAGE
configuration.label: User Error Message
configuration.description: The error code/message rendered in the Universal Login when the user attempts to register with a domain that is not approved.
configuration.default_value: Registrations must be approved, please contact us to learn more!
